name: old-charm
effect: Given to Cynthia’s grandmother to get the Surf HM.
short_effect: Trade to Cynthia’s grandmother in Celestic Town for HM04 (Surf).

flavor_text.sun-moon: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
